Hi Ken,

It's not an area I know much about but have you looked on sourceforge?

http://sourceforge.net/softwaremap/trove_list.php?form_cat=81

Mostly these are specific games but the top listing (Marauroa) seems to 
be some kind of SDK, perhaps there are some other similar projects in 
there also.

Colin.

Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>As some of you know, we are working on a game here that uses NEAT as
>its core AI.  We have a graphical game engine that is working for us
>for now, but we are starting to think more long-term about the right
>engine for the future.  I wonder if anyone here knows any way to 
>license or obtain an RTS-style game engine from any company or
>organization?  There are several first-person-shooter style engines
>available, but it's much harder to find an RTS engine.  Any
>suggestions would be apprecated!
>
>ken
>
>
>  
>
